    • Method Detail

      • serverStatus

        boolean serverStatus(byte[] result)
        Gets server status.
        Parameters:
        result - server status (0x10 means CONNECTED, 0x20 means DISCONNECTED)
        Returns:
        always true

        Parameters:
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • printText

        boolean printText(java.lang.String strText,
                  byte[] result)
        Print text on remote device.
        Parameters:
        strText - Null-terminated string with text to be printed. Max length is 511 characters. The string must end with line feed character.
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • printBitmap

        boolean printBitmap(byte[] bmpBuf,
                    int bmpSize,
                    byte[] result)
        Print bitmap on remote device. Bitmap characteristics are: - max width: 384 - max height: 1024 - no compression - 1, 2 or 4 color bits
        Parameters:
        bmpBuf - Bitmap buffer
        bmpSize - Bitmap size
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • storeLogo

        boolean storeLogo(java.lang.String name,
                  int type,
                  byte[] bmpBuf,
                  int bmpSize,
                  byte[] result)
        Store logo (bitmap image) in remote device for further printing. Bitmap characteristics are: - max width: 384 - max height: 1024 - no compression - 1, 2 or 4 color bits
        Parameters:
        name - Null-terminated string containing the name of the logo (8 characters max, upper case)
        type - Unused. Must be set to 1.
        bmpBuf - Bitmap buffer
        bmpSize - Bitmap size
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • printLogo

        boolean printLogo(java.lang.String name,
                  byte[] result)
        Print logo (bitmap image) stored in iWL (either with previous call to storeLogo or with other available methods used to load some files in terminal: LLT, Ingestate).
        Parameters:
        name - Null-terminated string containing the name of the logo (8 characters max, upper case)
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • getPrinterStatus

        boolean getPrinterStatus(byte[] result)
        Get remote device printer status.
        Parameters:
        result - Result of the operation (bitfield) 0x00=OK 0x01=KO 0x10=PRINTER ERROR 0x20=PAPER OUT 0x40=CONNECTION FAILED (when using Bluetooth printer) 0x80=PRINTER BATTERY LOW (when using Bluetooth printer)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

        boolean getTerminalTime(byte[] time)
        Get remote device time.
        Parameters:
        time - Time of the remote device.
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see time for command result). false if the method failed.

                        byte[] productNumber)
        Read Telium information (serial number, product number)

        productNumber - Product number of the remote device.

      • getTerminalComponents

        boolean getTerminalComponents(java.lang.String strPath)
        Fetch information about the components installed on the Telium terminal.
        Parameters:
        strPath - File name where to store components list. The file will be stored in PclService data directory. You can access it with: createPackageContext("com.ingenico.pclservice",0).openFileInput(strPath);
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • doTransaction

        boolean doTransaction(TransactionIn transIn,
                      TransactionOut transOut)
        This launches a transaction request, passing the input parameters to the payment module. The output parameters are filled with the response from the payment module.
        Parameters:
        transIn - Input parameters for transaction.
        transOut - Output parameters for transaction.
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.
        See Also:
        TransactionIn, TransactionOut

      • doTransactionEx

        boolean doTransactionEx(TransactionIn transIn,
                        TransactionOut transOut,
                        int appNumber,
                        byte[] inBuffer,
                        long inBufferSize,
                        byte[] outBuffer,
                        long[] outBufferSize)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This launches a transaction request, passing the input parameters to the payment module and custom extended input data. The output parameters are filled with the response from the payment module and custom extended output data are received too.
        Parameters:
        transIn - Input parameters for transaction.
        transOut - Output parameters for transaction.
        appNumber - This value explicitly specified the Telium application number to contact (destination of the PDA_START_TRANSACTION ServiceCall, see Telium documentation for more detail). Set it to zero if no explicit selection is required.
        inBuffer - Pointer to the input extended data to pass as parameter to the PDA_START_TRANSACTION ServiceCall.
        inBufferSize - Size of the input extended data to pass as parameter to the PDA_START_TRANSACTION ServiceCall.
        outBuffer - Pointer to the output extended data to receive as parameter from the PDA_START_TRANSACTION ServiceCall.
        outBufferSize - Maximum size of the output extended data to receive as parameter from the PDA_START_TRANSACTION ServiceCall, and this variable is updated with the actual buffer size.
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if outBuffer or outBufferSize is null
        See Also:
        TransactionIn, TransactionOut

      • doTmsInstall

        boolean doTmsInstall(byte[] result)
        Launch a Telium install for OfflineJobs. Offline Jobs are downloaded from TEM server configured for Offline installation
        Parameters:
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO, 2=Offline Jobs to install)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • resetTerminal

        boolean resetTerminal(int info)
        Reset Telium deletion of OfflineJobs.
        Parameters:
        info - code to return when resetting the terminal (see OEM_exit() definition in Telium SDK Help for more information on return code).
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.

      • powerOffTerminal

        boolean powerOffTerminal(int info)
        Power Off Telium terminal. This feature is only available for Telium 3 devices.
        Parameters:
        info - code to return when power off the terminal (see OEM_exit() definition in Telium SDK Help for more information on return code).
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.

      • inputSimul

        boolean inputSimul(byte[] key)
        Simulate input key on the Telium terminal.
        Parameters:
        key - string (null terminated) containing the input to simulate (only valid Telium input are allowed, see Telium SDK Help for more information).
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.

      • sendMessage

        boolean sendMessage(byte[] message,
                    int[] byteSent)
        Send message to the terminal.
        Parameters:
        message - Buffer containing the message to send to the terminal. (size must not be greater than 1024 bytes)
        byteSent - Number of bytes sent, if the message cannot be sent the result is equal to zero
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.

      • receiveMessage

        boolean receiveMessage(byte[] message,
                       int[] byteRecvd)
        Receive a message from the terminal.
        Parameters:
        message - Buffer that will receive the message received.
        byteRecvd - Number of bytes received, if no message received, the value returned in this variable is zero.
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded false if the method failed.

      • addDynamicBridge

        int addDynamicBridge(int port,
                     int direction)
        Add TCP/IP bridge between Android device and Telium device.
        Parameters:
        port - TCP port to connect to or to listen (depending on direction parameter)
        direction - Bridge direction: 0 means Android connects to Telium TCP port 1 means Telium connects to Android TCP port
        Returns:
        0 in case of success, negative value in case of error -1: no more available bridges -2: bridge already exists -3: issue during thread creation -4: bridge initialization failed

      • isPrinterBatteryLow

        boolean isPrinterBatteryLow(byte[] result)
        Get printer battery status. It is recommended to load the printer battery before printing if the battery is low.
        Parameters:
        result - Result of the operation (1 means battery is low, 0 means battery is not low)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • isPrinterConnected

        boolean isPrinterConnected(byte[] result)
        Get printer connection status. (for Bluetooth printers).
        Parameters:
        result - Result of the operation (1 means connected, 0 means not connected)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

                    byte[] result)
        Get last info from Telium for specific API.
        Parameters:
        api - api which cache info from Telium on OpenOs
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see updateInfo for command result). false if the method failed or if the API was not used yet.

      • addDynamicBridgeLocal

        int addDynamicBridgeLocal(int port,
                          int direction)
        Add TCP/IP bridge between Android device and Telium device. In case of bridge from Android to Telium, listen is done only on localhost.
        Parameters:
        port - TCP port to connect to or to listen (depending on direction parameter)
        direction - Bridge direction: 0 means Android connects to Telium TCP port 1 means Telium connects to Android TCP port
        Returns:
        0 in case of success, negative value in case of error -1: no more available bridges -2: bridge already exists -3: issue during thread creation -4: bridge initialization failed

      • openBarcodeWithInactivityTo

        boolean openBarcodeWithInactivityTo(int inactivityTimeout,
                                    byte[] result)
        Open barcode reader on remote device with an activity timeout.
        Parameters:
        inactivityTimeout - Inactivity timeout (in 10ms units) for barcode reader to be closed automatically
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetReaderMode

        boolean bcrSetReaderMode(int mode,
                         byte[] result)
        Configure barcode reader mode on remote device.
        Parameters:
        mode - Single scan = 0, Multiple scan = 1
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetGoodScanBeep

        boolean bcrSetGoodScanBeep(int beepMode,
                           byte[] result)
        Configure barcode reader good scan beep on remote device.
        Parameters:
        beepMode - Disable = 0, 1 beep = 1, 2 beeps = 2
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrEnableTrigger

        boolean bcrEnableTrigger(int isEnable,
                         byte[] result)
        Configure barcode reader trigger on remote device.
        Parameters:
        isEnable - Disable = 0, Enable = 1
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetImagerMode

        boolean bcrSetImagerMode(int imagerMode,
                         byte[] result)
        Configure barcode reader imager mode on remote device.
        Parameters:
        imagerMode - 1D = 0, 1D2D = 1, 1D2D bright = 2, 1D2D reflective = 3
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetBeep

        boolean bcrSetBeep(int freq,
                   int length,
                   byte[] result)
        Configure barcode reader beep on remote device.
        Parameters:
        freq - Frequency in Hz (between 1000 and 5110 Hz)
        length - Duration in ms (between 0 and 2550 ms)
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetLightingMode

        boolean bcrSetLightingMode(int mode,
                           byte[] result)
        Configure barcode reader lighting mode on remote device.
        Parameters:
        mode - illuminationLEDPriority = 0, aperturePriority = 1
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

        Get barcode reader firmware version.
        Parameters:
        version - Buffer to receive firmware version
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetNonVolatileMode

        boolean bcrSetNonVolatileMode(int set,
                              byte[] result)
        Set storage mode for parameters. When using non volatile mode, parameters are restored when the barcode reader is opened.
        Parameters:
        set - 1 to set non volatile mode, 0 to set volatile mode
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrSetSettingsVersion

        boolean bcrSetSettingsVersion(byte[] version,
                              byte[] result)
        Set version number for parameters stored in non volatile memory
        Parameters:
        version - Version number (two bytes)
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • bcrGetSettingsVersion

        boolean bcrGetSettingsVersion(byte[] version)
        Get version number for parameters stored in non volatile memory
        Parameters:
        version - Buffer to receive version number (two bytes)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • tmsReadParam

        boolean tmsReadParam(java.lang.String[] ip_addr,
                     java.lang.String[] port,
                     java.lang.String[] identifier,
                     java.lang.String[] ssl_profiles,
                     java.lang.String[] current_ssl_profile,
                     byte[] result)
        Read terminal TMS parameters
        Parameters:
        ip_addr - String array to receive TMS IP address
        port - String array to receive TMS IP port
        identifier - String array to receive TMS identifier
        ssl_profiles - String array to receive available SSL profiles (20 profiles at most)
        current_ssl_profile - String array to receive current SSL profile
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • tmsWriteParam

        boolean tmsWriteParam(java.lang.String ip_addr,
                      java.lang.String port,
                      java.lang.String identifier,
                      java.lang.String ssl_profile,
                      byte[] result)
        Write terminal TMS parameters
        Parameters:
        ip_addr - TMS IP address (null to keep current value)
        port - TMS IP port (null to keep current value)
        identifier - TMS identifier (null to keep current value)
        ssl_profile - SSL profile (null to keep current value, empty string to disable SSL)
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • getSPMCIVersion

        boolean getSPMCIVersion(byte[] version)
        Get Telium SPMCI component version.
        Parameters:
        version - byte array to receive SPMCI version (4 bytes at least)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • setPrinterFont

        boolean setPrinterFont(int font,
                       byte[] result)
        Set printer font on remote device.
        Parameters:
        font - Integer corresponding to the font (@link Fonts) This font will be used for all next printings.
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

      • setBacklightLock

        boolean setBacklightLock(int lock,
                         byte[] result)
        Set backlight lock on terminal.
        Parameters:
        lock - 0 to unlock backlight, 3 to lock backlight (unlocked by keyboard)
        result - Result of the operation (0=OK, 1=KO)
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded (see result for command result). false if the method failed.

        Get terminal battery level
        Parameters:
        level - Battery level (in percentage). 0 is returned if the terminal doesn't have a battery.
        Returns:
        true if the method succeeded. false if the method failed.

      • stopPcl

        int stopPcl()
        Request to stop PCL on the reader
        Returns:
        0x00 if method failed. 0x01 if method succeed. 0x02 if PCL is not connected or aborted before getting response.

      • connectPcl

        Returns:
